books.author: by Jeffrey Archer
books.description: The sixth and penultimate book of the Clifton Chronicles brings the Cliftons and the Barringtons into the 1970s.
books.name: COMETH THE HOUR

books.author: by Jojo Moyes
books.description: A woman who has barely been beyond her English village finds herself while caring for a wealthy, embittered quadriplegic.
books.name: ME BEFORE YOU

books.author: by Penelope Ward
books.description: A woman must share an inherited house with the man she dumped long ago.
books.name: ROOMHATE

books.author: by Lisa Gardner
books.description: The detective D.  D. Warren hunts for a missing woman who was kidnapped and abused as a student and may have become a vigilante.
books.name: FIND HER

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: Two sisters are separated in World War II France: one in the countryside, the other in Paris.
books.name: THE NIGHTINGALE

books.author: by James Patterson and Marshall Karp
books.description: Detective Zach Jordan and his partner pursue a cold-blooded killer.
books.name: NYPD RED 4

books.author: by J. D. Robb
books.description: Lt. Eve Dallas of the N.Y.P.D. helps a friend and her husband solve a mystery involving politics and real estate; by Nora Roberts, writing pseudonymously.
books.name: BROTHERHOOD IN DEATH

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: A historic hotel in Maryland is getting a face-lift from the Montgomery brothers and their eccentric mother; Book 1 of the Inn BoonsBoro trilogy.
books.name: THE NEXT ALWAYS

books.author: by Karina Halle
books.description: Brigs and Natasha each look to turn from their tragic pasts with a fresh start in London.
books.name: THE LIE

books.author: by Fiona Barton
books.description: When a suspect in a missing-child case dies, reporters and the police think they’ll get the real story from his widow. They’re wrong.
books.name: THE WIDOW

books.author: by Andy Weir
books.description: Abandoned by his crew, an astronaut embarks on a dogged quest to stay alive.
books.name: THE MARTIAN

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: When Travis meets his new neighbor, his bachelor status erodes.
books.name: THE CHOICE

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: An English teacher travels back to 1958 by way of a time portal in a Maine diner. His assignment is to stop Lee Harvey Oswald.
